install.author: Algis Info Grup SRL
install.copyright: (c)2010 Algis Info Grup SRL. All rights reserved.
install.description: A module to display the contact form generated by aiContactSafe. Just select the profile to use from aiContactSafe and publish the module in the template position where you need the contact form. For "Fields values" use something like this "aics_name=default name|field2_name=value field2". "aics_name=default name" will set the default value of the field aics_name to "default name". You can use here all the fields defined in aiContactSafe.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling.

param.name: pf
param.label: Select profile
param.description: Select the profile id to use in the contact form.

param.name: use_css
param.label: Profile's CSS
param.description: Enable the CSS code defined for the selected profile

param.name: fd_values
param.label: Fields values
param.description: Specify the values to use as default for each field. Use something like this : aics_name=default name|field2_name=value field2 .

param.name: donate
param.label: You can help us
param.description: If you think this extension helped you, you can help us keep the projects going, with a Paypal donation.
